title: "YouTuber finds path to Jesus via AI"
excerpt: "THE YouTuber Siraj Raval’s most popular videos teach his 750,000 subscribers how to use artificial intelligence (AI) for financial gain. But nestling among the videos about how to use AI to make money from sports betting or trading crypto-currencies is “AI Jesus Made Me a Believer”."
